content.en: A light raying into my eyes, forcing me open my eyes.
content.cn: 一道光芒射入了我的眼睛，让我微微睁开了双眼。

content.en: I lifted my right hand, glanced at the watch.
content.cn: 我抬起右手，看了一眼手表。

content.en: It was seven o'clock in Earth Time.
content.cn: 现在是地面时间的七点整。

content.en: It's time to get up. The visor opened on time, sent into the sunshine.
content.cn: 起床的时间到了，身边的遮阳板准时的打开，送进了阳光。

content.en: But I still don't want to leave my bed.
content.cn: 但我还没有要起来的意思。

content.en: I turned around, looking at her.
content.cn: 转过身去，看了一下她。

content.en: With a patch over her face, she tightly wrapped in a sleeping bag, and seems haven't wake up yet.
content.cn: 她戴着眼罩，紧紧的裹在睡袋里，看来还没有醒。

content.en: This is already the tenth day.
content.cn: 这已经是第十天了。

content.en: Since we go above the Earth, and fly into space, it is already the tenth day.
content.cn: 自从我们离开地面，进入太空，已经是第十天了。

content.en: However, our ship still moves around the circle of Earth orbit.
content.cn: 然而现在，我们的飞船仍然在地球轨道上绕着圈子。

content.en: There are hundreds of all kinds of ships waiting for orbital transfering in front of us.
content.cn: 我们的前面，还有数百架大大小小的飞船等着变轨。

content.en: We are all impatient. No one feels good for a queue of more than 10 days.
content.cn: 大家都很急躁，十多天的排队，不是那么好受的。

content.en: But we have to follow the arrangements of International Space Station. Otherwise the trip will in danger even when this long journey has just begun.
content.cn: 但我们必须听从国际空间站的安排，否则这长长的旅程刚刚开始，就要面临危险。

content.en: Yes, this is a long journey.
content.cn: 没错，这是一段长长的旅程。

content.en: The ten days of waiting, is just the beginning.
content.cn: 这十天的等待，只是一个开始。

content.en: When we start to transfer orbit, when we rid the bondage of Earth, when we rid the bondage of the Sun.
content.cn: 当我们开始变轨，脱离地球的束缚，脱离太阳的束缚的时候。

content.en: Where is the end of the road we have walked on?
content.cn: 我们踏上的这条漫漫长路，又何时是尽头？

content.en: I can't help to make a sigh.
content.cn: 我不禁感叹了一声。

content.en: And then sat up, looking out the blue planet through the ship's thick glass.
content.cn: 然后坐了起来，透过飞船那厚厚的玻璃，望向那蔚蓝的星球。

content.en: That's not bad, leaving me time to say goodbye to my home.
content.cn: 不过这样也好，留给了我和故乡告别的时间。

content.en: We have around the Earth for about 200 times since taking off.
content.cn: 从起飞到现在，我们已经绕着地球转了大概200圈了。

content.en: Every time when the ship flies over the land I once lived at, I can't help but stare at it for a monent if I am awake.
content.cn: 每次飞过曾经居住的那块土地上空时，只要还醒着，就忍不住凝望片刻。

content.en: I can't help to looking back the time I still on the ground.
content.cn: 就忍不住回想在地面上的时光。

content.en: I can't help to thinking of the time that
content.cn: 就忍不住念想，

content.en: accompanied with her, we sown the little seeds named "hope".
content.cn: 我和她一起，在地面上播种的那小小的“希望”。

content.en: It makes me very sad when the things which close in the past now will leave me far away.s
content.cn: 曾经近在咫尺的东西，即将相隔星辰，让我十分的感伤。

content.en: The blue planet is gradually losing her colors.
content.cn: 蔚蓝的星球正渐渐失去她的色彩。

content.en: The ship will come into the back of the Earth again.
content.cn: 飞船又将进入地球背面了。

content.en: Once again, I lie down, close my eyes.
content.cn: 我再次躺下，闭上了眼睛。

content.en: Before the spacecraft accelerated, all members will fall into a state of deep sleeping.
content.cn: 在飞船加速之前，所有成员都会进入深度睡眠状态。

content.en: It has no meaning to sleep now.
content.cn: 现在多睡也没有意义了。

content.en: But every time I close my eyes, settled down, "he" will appear in front of me.
content.cn: 但每当我闭上眼睛，静下心来，眼前就会出现“他”的影子。

content.en: He's the gift God gives us. He's our life's treasures.
content.cn: 那是上天给我们的恩赐，是我们毕生的宝物。

content.en: He's our hope, but also our sin.
content.cn: 那是我们的希望， 但也是我们的罪恶。

content.en: I don't want to forget.
content.cn: 我不希望自己忘记。

content.en: Even if I do not expect my mistakes can be forgiven.
content.cn: 即便不奢望自己的过错能得到原谅。

content.en: But if there was a trace of may, there is a glimmer of hope, our efforts can be rewarded.
content.cn: 但如果有那么一丝可能，有那么一丝希望，我们的努力能得到回报的话。

content.en: Even if buried in endless universe, I have no regrets.
content.cn: 即便葬身在无尽的宇宙中，也没有遗憾了。

content.en: The Sun vanished, only the lights in cabin still flashing.
content.cn: 阳光彻底消失了，只有舱内的灯光还在闪烁着。

content.en: She trembled slightly.
content.cn: 她微微的颤动了一下。

content.en: It seems that she has waken up.
content.cn: 看来已经醒了。

content.en: The electronic screen besides the bed showing that the ships waiting in line is less than 100.
content.cn: 床边的电子屏上，显示着排队的飞船还有不足一百架。

content.en: We both held out our hand, helding tightly.
content.cn: 我们同时伸出了手，紧紧的握在了一起。

content.en: A little cold, a little warm.
content.cn: 一点点的冰冷，一点点的温暖。

content.en: I picked up the remote control, truned off the last lights.
content.cn: 我拿起了遥控器，把最后一点灯光关闭。

content.en: Check the harness for a last time.
content.cn: 最后检查了一遍绑在身上的安全带。

content.en: The temperature began to drop dramatically. It came to be so cold that hard to breath.
content.cn: 室温开始急剧下降，冷到无法呼吸。

content.en: The last piece of heat in palm began to disperse.
content.cn: 手心里最后的一点余热也开始散去。

content.en: A strong feeling of sleep swept through.
content.cn: 一股强烈的睡意席卷而来。

content.en: OK.
content.cn: 好了。

content.en: It's time to start our journey.
content.cn: 是时候，该启程了。
